quote: What this world doesn't have is the three-wishes, go-to-the-ball-and-meet-your-prince, happily-ever-after kind of magic. We have all the mangling and malevolent kinds. Who *invented* this system?
quote_letters: WHAT THIS WORLD DOESNT HAVE IS THE THREE-WISHES GO-TO-THE-BALL-AND-MEET-YOUR-PRINCE HAPPILY-EVER-AFTER KIND OF MAGIC WE HAVE ALL THE MANGLING AND MALEVOLENT KINDS WHO INVENTED THIS SYSTEM
